album: I Was The Loner of Paradise Valley
lyrics: So you're going to read Plato's myth of the cave?
I gotta warn you, it's not easy
Before you explore, there are a few things you should know
I hold your heart in amber
You're a little white lie in my smile
You’re a grain of salt in the sea
You’re a ghost living in my pocket
You're the best of every game I've ever played
From the valley to the ever burning everglade
Is the moon always whole in the night?
Many go in, but few come out
I know you're more than that!
I'll make a nativity for you
Confess! I'll be waiting in the booth for you
Tell me everything I've ever wanted
But that makes two of us
I've been dumb like you, so who's really to blame?
Show me a sign! Are you real? Are you there?
I don't know any other way
To live with myself and you
You know how we do it
And I've got faith like that
At the drop of a hat
